# Orderly Network

> Orderly is an omnichain orderbook-based trading infrastructure providing perpetual futures liquidity for decentralized exchanges. It offers a shared CLOB (Central Limit Order Book) accessible from all major EVM chains, enabling builders to create their own Perps DEX with plug-and-play SDKs and APIs. Orderly operates as backend infrastructure — no front end — with on-chain settlement and full self-custody.

API Base: `https://api.orderly.org/` (Mainnet), `https://testnet-api.orderly.org` (Testnet). Authentication uses ed25519 signatures. Symbol format: `PERP_<TOKEN>_USDC`.

## Getting Started

- [What is Orderly?](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/getting-started/what-is-orderly): Overview of Orderly's unified trading infrastructure for DEXes, use cases, and omnichain vision
- [Key Advantages](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/getting-started/benefits): Benefits of building on Orderly's infrastructure
- [Our Mission](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/getting-started/our-mission): Connecting traders across chains with the omnichain approach
- [Roadmap](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/getting-started/roadmap): Development roadmap and milestones

## $ORDER Tokenomics

- [Overview of $ORDER](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/tokenomics/overview-of-order): $ORDER token overview and utility
- [Distribution and Emission Schedule](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/tokenomics/distribution-and-emission-schedule): Token distribution plan and emission schedule
- [Retroactive Airdrop](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/tokenomics/retroactive-airdrop): Retroactive airdrop details
- [$ORDER Staking](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/tokenomics/order-staking/staking): Staking mechanisms and rewards
- [Staking Information](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/tokenomics/order-staking/staking-information): Detailed staking parameters
- [esORDER](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/tokenomics/esorder): Escrowed ORDER token mechanics
- [$ORDER Contract Addresses](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/tokenomics/addresses): Smart contract addresses for $ORDER token

## Trade on Orderly

- [Getting Started with Trading](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/trade-on-orderly): Introduction to trading on Orderly
- [Orderbook Design](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/trading-basics/orderbook-design): Orderly's CLOB orderbook architecture
- [Glossary](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/trading-basics/glossary): Trading terminology and definitions
- [Perpetual Futures Trading](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/trading-basics/perpetual-futures): Introduction to perpetual futures on Orderly
- [Accounts](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/trading-basics/accounts): Account structure and hierarchy
- [Order Types](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/trading-basics/order-types): Supported order types (limit, market, stop, etc.)
- [Trading Fees](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/trading-basics/trading-fees): Fee structure overview
- [Formulas and Definitions](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/perpetual-futures/formulas-definitions): Key perpetual futures formulas
- [Margin, Leverage & PnL](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/perpetual-futures/margin-leverage-and-pnl): Margin requirements, leverage, and PnL calculations
- [Mark Price, Index Price, and Last Price](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/perpetual-futures/mark-price-index-price-and-last-price): Price types used in the system
- [Order Price Limit](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/perpetual-futures/orders-price-limits): Order price range limits
- [Funding Rate](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/perpetual-futures/funding-rate): Funding rate mechanism and calculation
- [Liquidations](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/perpetual-futures/liquidations): Liquidation process and thresholds
- [Insurance Fund & ADL](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/perpetual-futures/insurance-fund-and-adl): Insurance fund and auto-deleveraging mechanism
- [Supported Markets](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/supported-markets): List of all supported trading pairs
- [Supported Chains](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/supported-chains): EVM chains supported by Orderly
- [Multi-Collateral](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/multi-collateral): Multi-collateral support details
- [Builders](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/trade-on-orderly/builders): Front-ends and DEXes built on Orderly

- [Liquidity Provider](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/orderly-omniVault/liquidity-provider): LP deposit/withdrawal and share pricing
- [OmniVault FAQ](https://orderly.network/docs/introduction/orderly-omniVault/faq): Frequently asked questions about OmniVault

## Build on Omnichain - Getting Started

- [System Overview](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/building-on-omnichain): High-level 3-layer architecture (Asset Layer, Settlement Layer, Engine Layer)
- [Smart Contract Overview](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/overview): Contract interaction flows for deposit, trade, withdrawal, and settle PnL
- [Smart Contract Addresses](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/addresses): EVM contract addresses across 15+ supported chains (mainnet & testnet)
- [Partner Support](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/partner-support): Resources for integration partners
- [Integration Checklist](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/integration-checklist): Step-by-step integration guide
- [Integration FAQs](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/integration-faqs): Common integration questions and answers

## Build on Omnichain - User Flows

- [Accounts](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/accounts): Account creation and registration flow
- [Wallet Authentication](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/wallet-authentication): Wallet auth and Orderly key management
- [Deposit/Withdrawal](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/withdrawal-deposit): Deposit and withdrawal user flows
- [Settle PnL](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/settle-pnl): PnL settlement process
- [Order Management](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/order-management): Order creation, editing, and cancellation flows
- [Custom Fee Structure](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/custom-fees): Builder-specific fee configuration
- [Builder Staking Programme](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/builder-staking-programme): Builder staking for fee tier benefits
- [Delegate Signer](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/delegate-signer): Delegate trading authority to another key
- [Referral System](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/referral-system): Referral code creation and management
- [Algo Order Samples](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/algo-order-samples): Sample requests for algorithmic orders (TP/SL, trailing stop)
- [Internal Transfer](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/user-flows/internal-transfer): Transfer funds between accounts internally

## EVM REST API

- [API Introduction](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/introduction): REST and WebSocket API overview, base endpoints, rate limits
- [API Authentication](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/api-authentication): ed25519 signature-based authentication with code examples (Java, Python, TypeScript, cURL)
- [Error Codes](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/error-codes): API error codes and messages

## EVM REST API - Registration & Key Management

- [Check Account Exists](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/check-if-account-exists): Check if an account exists
- [Register Account](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/register-account): Register a new Orderly account
- [Get Registration Nonce](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-registration-nonce): Get nonce for account registration
- [Add Orderly Key](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/add-orderly-key): Add a new Orderly key to account
- [Get Orderly Key](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-orderly-key): Retrieve Orderly key info
- [Remove Orderly Key](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/remove-orderly-key): Remove an Orderly key
- [Get Current Orderly Key Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-current-orderly-key-info): Get info about current key
- [Set Orderly Key IP Restriction](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/set-orderly-key-ip-restriction): Set IP whitelist for a key

## EVM REST API - Order Management

- [Create Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/create-order): Place a new order
- [Batch Create Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/batch-create-order): Place multiple orders in a single request
- [Create Algo Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/create-algo-order): Create algorithmic orders (TP/SL, trailing stop, positional TP/SL)
- [Edit Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/edit-order): Modify an existing order
- [Edit Algo Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/edit-algo-order): Modify an existing algo order
- [Cancel Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/cancel-order): Cancel a single order by order_id
- [Cancel Algo Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/cancel-algo-order): Cancel a single algo order
- [Cancel All Pending Orders](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/cancel-all-pending-orders): Cancel all pending regular orders
- [Cancel All Pending Algo Orders](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/cancel-all-pending-algo-orders): Cancel all pending algo orders
- [Cancel All After](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/cancel-all-after): Dead man's switch — cancel all orders after timeout
- [Batch Cancel Orders](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/batch-cancel-orders): Cancel multiple orders at once
- [Get Order](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-order-by-order_id): Get order details by order_id
- [Get Orders](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-orders): Get list of orders with filters
- [Get Algo Orders](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-algo-orders): Get list of algo orders
- [Get Trades](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-trades): Get trade history
- [Get Trade](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-trade): Get a single trade by trade_id

## EVM REST API - Positions & Assets

- [Get All Positions](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-all-positions-info): Get all open positions
- [Get One Position](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-one-position-info): Get position info for a specific symbol
- [Get Position History](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-position-history): Get historical position data
- [Get Current Holding](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-current-holding): Get current asset holdings
- [Get Asset History](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-asset-history): Get asset transaction history
- [Create Withdraw Request](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/create-withdraw-request): Submit a withdrawal request
- [Request PnL Settlement](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/request-pnl-settlement): Request PnL settlement to withdraw profits
- [Get Funding Fee History](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-funding-fee-history): Get funding fee payment history

## EVM REST API - Account & Config

- [Get Account Information](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-account-information): Get account details and margin info
- [Update Leverage Setting](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/update-leverage-setting): Update leverage for a symbol
- [Get Leverage Configuration](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-leverage-configuration): Get available leverage tiers
- [Get User Statistics](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-user-statistics): Get user trading statistics
- [Set Maintenance Config](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/set-maintenance-config): Set account maintenance margin config

## EVM REST API - Market Data

- [Get Available Symbols](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-available-symbols): Get all tradable symbols
- [Get Market Trades](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-market-trades): Get recent market trades
- [Get Order Rules Per Symbol](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-order-rules-per-symbol): Get trading rules (min qty, tick size, etc.)
- [Get Market Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-market-info-for-all-symbols): Get market info for all symbols
- [Get Price Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-price-info-for-all-symbols): Get current prices for all symbols
- [Get Open Interest](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-open-interests-for-all-symbols): Get open interest for all markets
- [Get Funding Rate History](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-funding-rate-history-for-one-market): Get funding rate history per market
- [Get Predicted Funding Rates](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-predicted-funding-rates-for-all-markets): Get predicted funding rates
- [Get Supported Collateral Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-supported-collateral-info): Get supported collateral tokens info
- [Orderbook Snapshot](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/orderbook-snapshot): Get current orderbook snapshot
- [Get Kline](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-kline): Get candlestick/kline data

## EVM REST API - Liquidations

- [Get Positions Under Liquidation](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-positions-under-liquidation): Get currently liquidating positions
- [Get Liquidated Positions Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-liquidated-positions-info): Get historical liquidated positions
- [Claim Liquidated Positions](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/claim-liquidated-positions): Claim liquidated positions as liquidator
- [Claim Insurance Fund](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/claim-insurance-fund): Claim from insurance fund

## EVM REST API - Builder & Referral

- [Get Builder List](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-builder-list): Get list of builders on Orderly
- [Get Builder Volume](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-builder-volume): Get volume statistics per builder
- [Update User Fee Rate](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/update-user-fee-rate): Set custom fee rates for users (builder-only)
- [Create Referral Code](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/create-referral-code): Create a new referral code
- [Bind Referral Code](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/bind-referral-code): Bind a referral code to account
- [Get Referral Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-referral-info): Get referral program information

## EVM REST API - Staking & Valor

- [Get Staked Balance](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-wallets-current-staked-balance): Get current staked ORDER balance
- [Get Staking Overview](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-staking-overview): Get staking program overview
- [Get Valor Pool Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-valor-pool-info): Get Valor reward pool information
- [Get Valor Batch Info](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/get-valor-batch-info): Get Valor batch distribution info

## EVM REST API - Delegate Signer & Sub-Accounts

- [Register Delegate Signer](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/delegate-signer): Register a delegate signer
- [Add Delegate Signer Key](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/public/add-delegate-signer-orderly-key): Add Orderly key for delegate signer
- [Add Sub-Account](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/add-sub-account): Create a sub-account
- [Get Sub-Accounts](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/restful-api/private/get-sub-account): List sub-accounts

## WebSocket API

- [WebSocket Introduction](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/introduction): WebSocket endpoints, connection, and subscription format
- [PING/PONG](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/ping-pong): Heartbeat mechanism (10s interval)
- [WebSocket Authentication](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/authentication): Private WebSocket authentication flow
- [Error Response](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/error-response): WebSocket error response format

## WebSocket API - Public Market Data

- [Request Orderbook](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/request-orderbook): Request orderbook snapshot via WebSocket
- [Orderbook](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/orderbook): Subscribe to orderbook snapshots
- [Orderbook Update](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/order-book-update): Subscribe to orderbook incremental updates
- [Trade](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/trade): Subscribe to real-time trades
- [24h Ticker](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/24-hour-ticker): Subscribe to 24-hour ticker for one symbol
- [24h Tickers](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/24-hour-tickers): Subscribe to 24-hour tickers for all symbols
- [BBO](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/bbo): Best bid/offer stream for one symbol
- [BBOs](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/bbos): Best bid/offer stream for all symbols
- [K-Line](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/k-line): Subscribe to candlestick data
- [Index Price](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/index-price): Subscribe to index price for one symbol
- [Mark Price](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/mark-price): Subscribe to mark price for one symbol
- [Mark Prices](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/mark-prices): Subscribe to mark prices for all symbols
- [Open Interest](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/open-interest): Subscribe to open interest updates
- [Estimated Funding Rate](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/estimated-funding-rate): Subscribe to estimated funding rate
- [Liquidation Push](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/public/liquidation-push): Subscribe to liquidation events

## WebSocket API - Private User Data

- [Account](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/account): Subscribe to account updates
- [Balance](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/balance): Subscribe to balance changes
- [Execution Report](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/execution-report): Subscribe to order execution updates
- [Algo Execution Report](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/algo-execution-report): Subscribe to algo order execution updates
- [Notifications](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/notifications): Subscribe to account notifications
- [Position Push](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/position-push): Subscribe to position updates
- [Liquidation Account Push](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/liquidation-account-push): Subscribe to account liquidation events
- [PnL Settlement](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/pnl-settlement): Subscribe to PnL settlement updates
- [Wallet Transactions](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-omnichain/evm-api/websocket-api/private/wallet-transactions): Subscribe to wallet deposit/withdrawal events

- [SDK Changelog](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/changelog): SDK release notes and changes

## React Components SDK

- [React Components Overview](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/overview): Pre-built React UI components for trading interfaces
- [Getting Started](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/getting_started): Quick start guide for React Components SDK
- [Theming](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/theming): Customize component themes and styles
- [Wallet Integration](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/wallet): Wallet connector setup
- [Next.js Guide](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/next): Framework guide for Next.js integration
- [Trading Page](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/components/trading): Full trading page component
- [Deposit Component](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/components/deposit): Deposit UI component
- [Withdraw Component](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/components/withdraw): Withdrawal UI component
- [OrderBook Component](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/components/order_book): Orderbook display component
- [Portfolio Component](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/react/components/portfolio): Portfolio management component

## React Hooks SDK

- [Hooks Overview](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/overview): React hooks for Orderly integration
- [Setup](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/setup): Installation and configuration
- [useQuery](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/api/use-query): Hook for public API queries
- [usePrivateQuery](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/api/use-private-query): Hook for authenticated API queries
- [useMutation](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/api/use-mutation): Hook for API mutations (create/cancel orders)
- [useWS](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/api/use-ws): Hook for WebSocket subscriptions
- [useAccount](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/account/use-account): Hook for account state management
- [useOrderEntry](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/orders/use-order-entry): Hook for order entry form
- [useOrderStream](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/orders/use-order-stream): Hook for real-time order updates
- [usePositionStream](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/positions/use-position-stream): Hook for real-time position updates
- [useOrderbookStream](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/market-data/use-orderbook-stream): Hook for real-time orderbook data
- [useDeposit](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/assets/use-deposit): Hook for deposit operations
- [useWithdraw](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/hooks/assets/use-withdraw): Hook for withdrawal operations

## Core & Perp SDK

- [Core SDK Overview](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/core/overview): Low-level SDK for direct API interaction
- [Perp SDK Overview](https://orderly.network/docs/sdks/perp/overview): SDK for perpetual futures calculations

## Strategy Vault API

- [Vault Info](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-vault/public/vault-info): Get strategy vault details
- [Vault Statistics](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-vault/public/vault-overall-statistics): Get vault overall performance statistics
- [Vault Performance](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-vault/public/vault-performance): Get vault performance metrics
- [Vault Positions](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-vault/public/vault-positions): Get vault open positions
- [Vault Open Orders](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-vault/public/vault-open-orders): Get vault active orders
- [Vault Trade History](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-vault/public/vault-trade-history): Get vault trade history

## Liquidity Provider API

- [LP Info](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/liquidity-provider/public/lp-info): Get liquidity provider details
- [LP Performance](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/liquidity-provider/public/lp-performance): Get LP performance metrics
- [LP Transaction History](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/liquidity-provider/public/lp-transaction-history): Get LP deposit/withdrawal history
- [LP Claim Info](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/liquidity-provider/public/lp-claim-info): Get LP claimable rewards info

## Strategy Provider API

- [Get Strategy Provider Info](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-provider/public/get-strategy-providers-info): Get strategy provider details
- [Add SP Orderly Key](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-provider/private/add-sp-orderly-key): Add Orderly key for strategy provider
- [SP PnL Settlement](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-provider/private/request-sp-pnl-settlement): Request PnL settlement for strategy provider
- [SP Transaction History](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-provider/public/sp-transaction-history): Get SP transaction history

## Strategy Fund API

- [Get Strategy Fund Details](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-fund/public/get-strategy-fund-details): Get strategy fund information
- [Get Period History](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-fund/public/get-period-history-and-fund-period-instructions): Get period history and instructions
- [Get Fund Inflow Allocation](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-fund/public/get-fund-inflow-allocation): Get fund inflow allocation details
- [Get Fund Outflow Allocation](https://orderly.network/docs/strategy-vault/strategy-fund/public/get-fund-outflow-allocation): Get fund outflow allocation details

## NEAR Smart Contract API

- [NEAR Smart Contract Addresses](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-near/smart-contract-api/smart-contract-addresses): NEAR mainnet and testnet contract addresses
- [NEAR Withdrawal](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-near/smart-contract-api/withdrawal): NEAR smart contract withdrawal flow
- [NEAR Storage Staking](https://orderly.network/docs/build-on-near/smart-contract-api/storage-staking): NEAR storage deposit and staking
